org.apache.mina.io.filter
Class IoLoggingFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.mina.io.filter.IoLoggingFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IoFilter
public class IoLoggingFilter
extends Object
implements IoFilter

Logs all MINA I/O events to Logger.
